VoidSpawn.Author: tcvs
VoidSpawn.Description:
This plugin can teleport players to their own island when they enter the void.
(Requires Configuration)

RoseStacker Hook.Author: BONNe
RoseStacker Hook.Description: This addon adds 5 new flags for islands. There is protection flag for accessing stacked item GUI as well as 4 flags that allows toggling stacking for items, blocks, entities and spawners.

Nova Hook.Author: BONNe
Nova Hook.Description: This addon integrates Nova plugin in BentoBox protection system.

WildStacker Hook.Author: BONNe
WildStacker Hook.Description: This addon adds 5 new flags for islands. There is protection flag for accessing stacked item GUI as well as 4 flags that allows toggling stacking.

DragonFight.Author: BONNe
DragonFight.Description: This BentoBox addon changes that and enables the ability to fight ender dragons on each end island. Now every player will be able to have its own dragon to kill.

BoxedEyes.Author: Fredthedoggy
BoxedEyes.Description:
This plugin allows for custom Ender-Eye Point Locations to be defined per-island for gamemodes like Boxed.
This does not add End Portals, just sets the eye point location.

Holographic Displays.Author: filoghost
Holographic Displays.Description: This plugin allows do display holograms over AOneBlock block.

BentoBoxFAWEHandler.Author: HSGamer
BentoBoxFAWEHandler.Description: This BentoBox addon integrates FAWE to chunk & block processors.

BBAdvancementTeamSync.Author: EscanorTargaryen
BBAdvancementTeamSync.Description: Addon to sync teams between UltimateAdvancementAPI and BentoBox.

plugin.description: A Spigot Plugin That Links to BentoBox
